related_questions.question: What is the best pill for motion sickness?
related_questions.snippet: Scopolamine patches (Transderm Scop) are the best way to prevent nausea associated with motion sickness. They require a prescription, but they're preferred over popular over-the-counter alternatives. Scopolamine patches are more effective than the motion sickness antihistamine meclizine (Antivert or Bonine).Jul 3, 2018

related_questions.question: What is the best medication for sea sickness?
related_questions.snippet: The first is antihistamines, both prescription and over-the-counter. These are the most commonly used medications for motion sickness, and they're available in any drug store and in many supermarkets. Cyclizine (Marezine) and dimenhydrinate (Dramamine) are two major ones. Make sure to read the drug labels, though.Nov 7, 2018
